attributes.action: legalise the wearing of a pantomime horse outfit on alternate Tuesdays.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the people of The Pantomime Horse Association, Portsmouth, wish to see more people wearing said outfits. If the general public knew of a law allowing, nay, encouraging this, they would certainly don a costume - providing valuable work as contractors, barristers and Prime Ministers.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
